channel.title: What if we ACTUALLY rebuilt Runescape from scratch?
channel.description:
Hello Everyone!
RSPS has a lot of problems, that doesn't even need to be said... Even in the elite crowd there are problems... But why is that? Well, as with anyone who wants to make a RSPS they start with the server, and design it around the client. [b]But what if we designed both the server and the client in [u][i]parallel [/i][/u]from absolute scratch?[/b]
This is what I've been [i]experimenting[/i] with in my free time over the last week. For the Client I've been using [url=http://www.unity3d.com/]Unity3d[/url], and for the Models i've been using [url=http://www.blender.org/]Blender[/url] (don't make fun of my palm trees).
I am curious if anyone has tried this route, and what success they have had with it. I have attached my progress. (NOTE: I have little to no intention of finishing this project, but did want to present the idea)
[size=18pt][b]Login Preview:[/b][/size]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/269/loginpreview.png/][IMG]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/6501/loginpreview.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
[size=18pt][b]Game Play Preview[/b][/size]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/577/gameplaypreview.png/][IMG]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/5717/gameplaypreview.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
Download Link: [url=http://www.sendspace.com/file/jtzvjh]http://www.sendspace.com/file/jtzvjh[/url]

item.title: What if we ACTUALLY rebuilt Runescape from scratch?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:64, topic:446998”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=549899.msg4498244#msg4498244 date=1446567271]

Didn’t we lose like… The first year of data from this site?

7 months or so.

Haha no, I started it in late January 2006, shady host ‘went away’ and my current account has a creation date of February 22, 2006, so actually less than a month.

Ontopic, if we did create Runescape from scratch, wouldn’t it be all HTML5 and Websocket’s? I’m in if we can find someone to create the models, or maybe some free models to use?

Jagex has now reinvested tons of money to move away from HTML5 and go to C++ (for whatever reason I ASSumed it was HTML5 performance issues).
[/quote]
Where’d you get that information?[/quote]

RuneScape Wiki

NXT

NXT is Jagex's internal code name for a downloadable client written in C++ that was released on 18 April 2016. It supersedes the Java-based Game Client, which will eventually be phased out. NXT was first teased at RuneFest 2014 as the evolution of...

i was only partially right in the assumption they are keeping the html5 client it seems the c++ client is more for those gamers where the game is simply for the grahpics

Read full topic
item.source: What if we ACTUALLY rebuilt Runescape from scratch?

Ontopic, if we did create Runescape from scratch, wouldn’t it be all HTML5 and Websocket’s? I’m in if we can find someone to create the models, or maybe some free models to use?

Jagex has now reinvested tons of money to move away from HTML5 and go to C++ (for whatever reason I ASSumed it was HTML5 performance issues).
[/quote]
Where’d you get that information?[/quote]Which information? Moving away from HTML5? They made an announcement about moving away from HTML5 a while ago for the C++ client. It’s codenamed NXT if you want to look up more information.

Read full topic

item.title: What if we ACTUALLY rebuilt Runescape from scratch?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:57, topic:446998”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=549899.msg4465417#msg4465417 date=1419798658]

Didn’t we lose like… The first year of data from this site?

7 months or so.
[/quote]
Haha no, I started it in late January 2006, shady host ‘went away’ and my current account has a creation date of February 22, 2006, so actually less than a month.

Ontopic, if we did create Runescape from scratch, wouldn’t it be all HTML5 and Websocket’s? I’m in if we can find someone to create the models, or maybe some free models to use?[/quote]
Why do you suggest HTML5 mopar? I was under the impression its just not quite ready for the mmorpg world. Jagex has now reinvested tons of money to move away from HTML5 and go to C++ (for whatever reason I ASSumed it was HTML5 performance issues). However this being said if you would actually start a project and stay motivated I am sure a lot of us who lurk around here would be willing to join.

Read full topic
